entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Cobourg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:21 p.m. EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning late this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this evening then becoming east 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 5:53 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:53 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 10.
entry.summary: Rain ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 after midnight. Temperature steady near 10. Forecast issued 5:53 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
